record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the time today from 4:30 to 5:30 be equally divided and controlled between the two leaders or their designees, and that 10 minutes of the majority's time be allocated to Senator Feingold.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the majority leader be recognized at 12:30 p.m. today.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I note the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
